Tristan Brookes

Web designer

Profile

I'm a front-end developer / web designer. I think web designer is the better term but you know, it's confusing. I've been making websites for over 4 and a half years now as a freelancer and at agencies/startups.

I enjoy using responsive technologies to build websites and it's mostly all I've ever known, making fixed-width sites seems so strange to me. Asides from loving my career path I enjoy spending time with my wife, my pet guinea pigs and chasing that darn Wild Hunt.

Experience

Web designer Freelance

May 2016 - Present

Once again I am continuing my front-end work in a freelance capacity.

Front-end Developer Reward Cloud

Oct 2015 - April 2016

At Reward Cloud I was doing the front-end and integration work for the B2B platform, which is based on Laravel, for selling gift cards to employees as well as the admin interface and analytics suite they provide.

Web designer Webhaus

Mar 2015 - Oct 2015

At Webhaus I continued my front-end work in a freelance capacity. As well as still working with CMSs I'm also creating sites in systems like Jekyll and Shopify as well as using my time to learn even more new web technologies.

Front-end Developer Code 7

Jan 2012 - Feb 2015

At Code 7 as front-end developer I was in charge of setting up websites as well as making them look all sorts of pretty and functional. As well as my tasks as front-end developer I also helped clients with their ongoing support work and dabbled in a bit of hosting setup etc for the sister company and developed a fair few Joomla! modules.

Web designer Freelance

March 2011 - Jan 2012

Initially I set out to be freelance doing quite a few days a week at Code 7 as well as taking on some seperate projects such as The Woodville band site and doing Photoshop work with another colleague. Getting a marquee around a person's hair is hard work.

Education

University of Brighton Computer Science (Games) BSc - 2:1 hons

2007 - 2010

My computer science degree covered all areas like basic, old school, slice driven web design and DHTML, 3D modeling, OpenGL, Java, C++ and artificial intelligence. It was pretty ace.
